channel.title: Googles Recaptcha
channel.description:
I am under the impression that it hasn't been broken by a bot.
http://www.google.com/recaptcha/learnmore
This won't stop bots.. but it'll bring them one hell of a road block.
Thoughts?

item.title: Googles Recaptcha
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:8, topic:531572”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=650359.msg4367189#msg4367189 date=1379895358]
I was thinking about this being temporarily added on bot busting days without announcement.
[/quote]

except you would break any “hooks” involving the sleep code and the bot wouldn’t update as required most likely preventing it from logging in. I think you should either implement it or not.[/quote]

Wouldn’t you just implement it with a flag sent from the server to either turn it on or off?

Read full topic

item.title: Googles Recaptcha
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

I was thinking about this being temporarily added on bot busting days without announcement.

except you would break any “hooks” involving the sleep code and the bot wouldn’t update as required most likely preventing it from logging in. I think you should either implement it or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Googles Recaptcha
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:4, topic:531572”]if you are talking about the whole sleep code just remember it was originally broken by sleepwalker. If people are truly serious about botting on a private server they could just setup that service again.[/quote]keep in mind that sleepwalker probably had a hundred users. sure have we used a similar system with rsce/rsca but it didn’t work for long because there weren’t enough users to type in the words

Read full topic

item.title: Googles Recaptcha
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

if you are talking about the whole sleep code just remember it was originally broken by sleepwalker. If people are truly serious about botting on a private server they could just setup that service again.

What if you limited the user to 20 seconds to enter the words before switching to another captcha? Plenty of time for someone at the computer, probably not enough time for a screenshot to be taken, uploaded, downloaded, completed by someone else and then completed by the client.

Read full topic

item.description:

if you are talking about the whole sleep code just remember it was originally broken by sleepwalker. If people are truly serious about botting on a private server they could just setup that service again.

do you plan on implementing these captcha’s in the client?

item.title: Googles Recaptcha
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Its a PITA though. I like People Sign because its not annoying but pretty difficult to break: http://peoplesign.com/main/officialDemo.html

Read full topic
